thread.title: 9 Denim Jackets That Will Overhaul Any Outfit
thread.title_full: 9 Denim Jackets That Will Overhaul Any Outfit

title: 9 Denim Jackets That Will Overhaul Any Outfit
text: 9 Denim Jackets That Will Overhaul Any Outfit X Shopping 9 Denim Jackets That Will Overhaul Any Outfit You and every guy you know owns a classic blue denim jacket . Whether dark or light , slim-cut or oversized, it's a staple that never goes out of style and is flattering at every age. But, there's no rule that states you can only own one. In fact, designers are riffing on the classic in so many far-out, deeply stylish ways, it's almost a shame if you limit yourself to the classic interpretation. For a change of pace this spring try one in a strong neutral like white or beige, or an off-beat color like light pink or deep red, then go about breaking it in and even customizing it with patches, pins, or a swanky lining so it looks older than you are. The only thing cooler than an unconventional denim jacket is one that looks like a second skin instead of a fashion statement. Achieve that vibe and your friends while be tempted the steal the thing right off your back. Swipe to see the photos Read More
